website_summaries.verdict: The Sagler 3 tier chocolate fountain offers reception-level performance at an entry level price point. Proper balance is an important consideration, and this model makes it easy. Can also be used as a cheese fondue fountain for Super Bowl parties.
pros: Adjustable feet and a bubble level makes it easy to balance on table
Holds up to 4 pounds of product
Easy to assemble and maintain during operation
cons: Total capacity may be overstated, some users suggest 2 pounds maximum
Heating product can be a lengthy process

customer_reviews.title: just don't
customer_reviews.text: This is an item I bought to use at my daughter's wedding reception. I was never able to get it to work right. It didn't completely melt the chocolate, even though it was the type recommended for it, and 'fountain' is a completely inaccurate description for what this did. It kind of glopped out of the top then started immediately drying on the first tier. When we finally gave up on it we then found that it was impossible to clean so it could be returned...and just threw it in the trash where it belonged. I very much recommend you not waste your money on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Kellygreen

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This worked a lot better than I expected for the cost. The only reason it gets 4 stars instead of 5 is that the chocolate gaps instead of a smooth flow. It was however, not bad enough to make me regret my choice! I HIGHLY suggest pre melting the chocolate before adding it to the fountain. I did this in the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: KIM C

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would've paid a little more for better quality.
customer_reviews.text: It took forever almost 2 hours to warm up. and could only add a handful of chocolate at a time. It took almost 3 hours to get it to work properly. and even when it did chocolate only came down one side. You get what you pay for. I wish I would've paid a little more for better quality.
